sentences.en: A gash, a rash and purple bumps.
sentences.cn: 有个伤口 、 有疹子和紫色肿块.

sentences.en: Blood poured from a deep gash in her forehead.
sentences.cn: 鲜血从她额头上一道很深的伤口汩汩地流出来。

sentences.en: Blood poured from the gash in his face.
sentences.cn: 血从他的脸上那一道深深的伤口里涌了出来.

sentences.en: Dick had a large gash on his cheek.
sentences.cn: 迪克的脸颊上有了一道很大的伤口.

sentences.en: He cannot work today; he got a gash in his hand while axing.
sentences.cn: 他今天无法工作, 因为他在使用斧头时手被切伤了.

sentences.en: He howled like a wounded animal as blood spurted from the gash.
sentences.cn: 当血从伤口中喷出时，他像一只受伤的动物一样嚎叫起来。

sentences.en: He was a gash an'faithful tyke.
sentences.cn: 他是一位聪明忠诚的村夫.

sentences.en: He was bleeding a gash on his head.
sentences.cn: 他头上的刀口正在流血.

sentences.en: I was frightened when I saw the nasty gash in her arm.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊上又深又长的大伤口吓坏了我.

sentences.en: Liang Kai's cardiac drunk together green, brush - like gash thick yellow oil.
sentences.cn: 亮开一道心迷的醉绿, 刷刷划开油彩般厚重的黄土.

sentences.en: Nick had a large gash on his cheek.
sentences.cn: 尼克的脸颊上有一道很大很深的伤口.

sentences.en: Sally got a gash in her leg when she was skiing.
sentences.cn: 莎?在溜冰时,腿上割了一道很深的伤.

sentences.en: There was a gash of blood from the wound reopening.
sentences.cn: 伤口再次裂开时血流如注.

sentences.en: There was an inch-long gash just above his right eye.
sentences.cn: 就在他右眼的上方有一条一英寸长的伤口。

sentences.en: Who was it coagulated the blood, stopped the gash wove new skin?
sentences.cn: 当时是谁让血流停止、伤口愈合并长出新的肌肤?

sentences.en: You can see the four - inch gash in the painting.
sentences.cn: 画布上有长达4英寸的裂缝.

trans.tran_cn: 深长的切口（或伤口），裂缝
trans.tran_en: a large deep cut or hole in something, for example in a person’s skin

trans.tran_cn: 划开；砍入很深；（使）负深伤
